block.name: Tx packet source
block.doc:
This block will send time-synchronized packets on the forward link. It also compensates the transmitted message for the LO clock offset, with the appropriate frequency corrections for the LO clock offset at different frequencies.
Parameters: Sample rate: sample rate of the system Time delay: delay (in seconds) between the feedback message and the transmitted message Nbr samples packet: length (in samples) of the transmitted message Input freq.: carrier frequency of the feedback link Output freq.: carrier frequency of the forward link
